doc:
Marguerite Clark https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marguerite_Clark 0 Marguerite Clark (born Helen Marguerite Clark, February 22, 1883 – September 25, 1940) was an American stage and silent film actress. As a movie actress, at one time, Clark was second only to Mary Pickford in popularity. Marguerite_Clark ( born Helen_Marguerite_Clark , February_22_,_1883 – September_25_,_1940 ) was an_American_stage and silent_film_actress . As a_movie_actress , at one_time , Clark was second_only to Mary_Pickford in popularity .
